name: Himalayan Quests - Day Tours
description: Himalayan Quests (HQ) is a Nepali company run by internationally accredited outdoors experts, educators and enthusiasts, each with over a decade of experience leading trips and expeditions at home and abroad. Nepal is not just a trekker’s paradise, but somewhere that can cater to every kind of traveler. This tiny, land locked country can boast some of the world’s best white water, amazing mountain biking trails, fascinating old towns, magnificent temples, ancient traditions, ethnic diversity and history stretching back thousands of years, as well as opportunities to see highly endangered wildlife in the jungles of its national parks. HQ specialise in treks that are off-the-beaten-path enabling you to experience the solitude, beauty and unique cultures the mountains and their people have to offer. As an organisation, HQ is aware of the fragility of the regions explored and seeks to improve and develop the communities they encounter, through the provision of jobs and education for local staff. HQ believes in an honest service, with no hidden costs or surprises, and through their work they help support Nepali children and communities in need by donating a percentage of their annual profits to projects run by local partners. HQ will create for you a tailor-made trip of a lifetime according to your requirements, budgets and timescales from a day day tours to multi days adventures. Each itinerary is created to suit your interests and desires, giving you as much help, guidance or freedom as you wish, while maintaining the company’s responsible travel ethics.If you would like to travel in an area not mentioned on our website, or customise an existing itinerary we will happily accommodate your needs.

Here are 125 ethnic group/caste, 123 languages are spoken but no single drop of blood shed on the name of religion clash, might be because of home of Living Goddess (Kumari) and Birthplace of Gautam Buddha (Founder of Buddhism). The primary object of this company is to make sure that the arrangement works dually. description: Amongst these bustling lanes lies the real magic of Kathmandu and a walk with a difference. Come on our exciting not for profit City Walks to discover stories of Gods and Goddesses, Kings, ceremonies and rituals, the shop keepers, musicians and the beautifully diverse communities whose thousands of tales are woven into the fabric of this incredible maze of houses, shops, temples and markets. Barter in the bazaar, try yummy snacks at our secret local hangouts, see incredible Hindu light ceremonies at Nepal’s most sacred river or jump on a rickshaw and whizz through the city with us as your guide. We have several walks to choose from! On the walk you will also learn about our skills training programme for the young people you are supporting simply by walking with us. Welcome to my yard is enabling positive futures for street-based children, young people and families at risk in Nepal. Take part in one of our amazing City Walks and you will also be donating to a great cause. Book today!

I highly recommend trying the local Nepalese dishes for an authentic taste of the region. The park is also very family-friendly, with plenty of activities for kids and adults alike. It's a great place to spend a day or even a weekend, and I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Pokhara. name: Pancha Kosha Himalayan Spa
description: The Pancha Kosha Himalayan Spa offers the treatments drawing from the ancient wisdom of the Vedas, Buddhist medicine and the rare medicinal herbs of the Himalayas. Aiming to address each Kosha, the therapies and massages have been designed to relax the senses and revive the body. We have a range of treatment suites, allowing guests to enjoy their treatment alone, as a couple or as a family. The Dwarika’s Spa is a sanctuary for healing and purification. It offers an experience modelled upon the ancient traditions of care and respect that have developed in the Himalayan region over several millennia. The name of the spa is derived from the wisdom of the Vedas that claims that our Atman or self is made up of five layers of being – the physical, the intellectual, emotional and the essence of the absolute. Combined, they offer an authentic experience of life. Thus, any treatment at the Pancha Kosha Spa is a journey into the self.

Our primary goal is to bridge the gap between these talented individuals and a global audience, fostering appreciation, understanding, and engagement with Nepal's rich cultural heritage. We work directly with local communities and artisans across Nepal, seeking out skilled craftsmen and women who create unique and exquisite traditional handicrafts. From intricately woven textiles and hand-carved wooden sculptures to delicate metalwork and vibrant paintings, our curated collection showcases the incredible talent and craftsmanship of Nepal's artisans.

name: Purna Yoga & Treks
description: Purna Yoga & Treks (also known as Nepal Yoga Trek) is a pioneer of yoga trekking tours in Nepal. Many people come to Nepal to experience the beauty and magic of trekking in the Himalayas. The idea of combining yoga with trekking was born in 2008 and we have been passionate in organizing yoga treks in Nepal ever since. At Purna Yoga & Treks, as skilled trekking guides and passionate yoga teachers, we wanted to offer people a better way to experience some of the world's most breathtaking scenery. After much experimenting and exploration on how to integrate trekking and yoga we found a winning formula. Our yoga treks and tours have been carefully designed to combine the best elements of each. We provide a gentle trekking schedule, healthy food, stretches for weary muscles, breathing exercises to ease breathing and time to relax, reflect and enjoy the location. Each day starts with a short meditation and gentle yoga session to awaken you to the beauty that surrounds you and connects your senses with nature. We take time to stretch even during the day to prevent muscle strain. At times we also stop along the trail to really appreciate the surroundings and meditate on the sound of a flowing river or engage in mountain gazing meditation. Afternoons are marked with yoga nidra - guided relaxation which allows us to integrate the day's experiences and is deeply rejuvenating. This combination of trekking, yoga and mindfulness is a sure way to connect with yourself and to help find inner balance and harmony in the natural setting of world's highest mountains.

name: Tenzing Bags - Boudha
description: We sell Authentic Tibetan Purses and Bags which are of excellent quality . The designs are unique and contemporary and when you visit us you will not go empty handed. We mostly sell wholesale for Nepal and many people take large quantities to sell in Europe and America. Our most expensive Bag is about 6700 NRS about $60 . We love people who buy presents from us .When you buy from us you know you are also supporting a Tibetan Business man who send these bags from Manjnu Ka Tilla. If you are in Delhi visit our sister store there and tell them you saw us on TRIPADVISOR

name: Lotus Mindfulness and Relaxation Services
description: We provide refreshing sound healing in Nepal along with a guided meditation to relax your mind & body. Traditional instruments such as singing bowls will spark the spiritual side of you whereas the modern ones such as crystal bowls & steel tongue combined with creatively crafted nature sounds will soak you in your imaginary nature. We also conduct internationally certified sound healing training.

name: Wongchhu Peak Promotion
description: Mr. Wongchhu Sherpa, who had many years of experience in the field of climbing expeditions, trekking, high altitude filming, and tours in Nepal, formed Wongchhu Peak Promotion. Wongchhu Peak Promotion is a government-approved hiking and climbing organization in Nepal. "May everyone who enter as our guests leave as our friends and families," we believe.

name: Mount Glory Treks & Expedition Pvt. Ltd.
description: We are travel agency known by the name of Mount Glory. If you have been working non-stop in your office and need a break, a long walk and some time alone with your thoughts, trekking is the best option.

name: Everest Helicopter  Tour Nepal
description: Everest Heli Tour Nepal is dedicated to deliver travelers from around the world the best helicopter flights in Nepal are towards the Himalayas and remote destinations. Everest Base Camp helicopter tour, Annapurna Base Camp helicopter tour and Muktinath helicopter tour are the most popular helicopter ride in Nepal.

name: Himalayan Independent Guides
description: Hello, Namaste. our guides welcome you to the beautiful Himalayan country- Nepal. We are a group of guides always standing to help you get in Himalaya which you have been dreaming of a long time ago.

name: Nepal Helicopter Service Pvt Ltd
description: Nepal Helicopter Service Pvt Ltd is one of the leading helicopter tour operators in Nepal works with multiple helicopter companies and offers wide range of helicopter services. The largest and most experienced helicopter sightseeing and charter service in the Himalayas, Nepal Helicopter offers wide ranges of heli tours on charter basis in comfortable way for luxury travelers and rescue services

name: Oasis Spa And Beauty Care
description: Oasis Spa and Beauty Care has an authentic and identifiable Nepali brand which has a demonstrated ability for transference across a range of markets. More importantly, we have allied with exceptional brands to reinforce the guaranteed quality we offer our clients. We have a spa menu including over 30 treatments, significant investment in long term staff training, and a focus on providing treatments that deliver noticeable results. We nurture our internal culture to ensure each member of the Oasis Spa and Beauty Care family is valued, respected and given opportunities to grow and develop. This is reflected in the quality of service experienced at our spas.

name: Unique Sherpa Trek and Expedition
description: Unique Sherpa trek & expedition Pvt. Ltd. is most of the best trekking company of Nepal. It is a government registered company. This company established since 2022 A.D, company Reg No: 279144/078/079, Pan No: 610167807. and tourism license No: 3069/079 issued by department of tourism. The company is legally authorized Nepal Rastra Bank (NRB).

name: Base Camp Everest trek
description: We have designed our Base Camp Everest trek with leadership development and events celebrations theme. These programs take you to the highest point on earth in which you develop other various skills together. The entire Everest region is blessed with myth, mystery, and courage which attracts various capacities inherent in you. We beautifully innovate and craft our Base Camp Everest Trek for you. Programs are combined with leadership and personal development, corporate and social events celebrations and team building/networking theme. We have developed two itineraries based on your time availability. First, the classic Everest Base Camp trek is for those with enough time. And the second Everest Base Camp Trek with Helicopter for you with limited time who can afford comparative expensive cost. We can make Heli tour shorter though not highly recommended. You can fly either to Namchebazzar or to Tengboche from Kathmandu and start your trek.

name: Nepal Trek Hub
description: Nepal Trek Hub (NTH) is a Nepalese local trek/tour agency which is established and registered under the Nepal company act. Nepal Trek Hub (NTH) organizes the trek, tour, peak climbing, outdoor activities, camping and many other recreational activities in Nepal. We have very excellent track records of our service. Understanding the customer's wish and making the customized tailored plan for them, as per their time and interest is our speciality. We give our best and provide partial service by doing a deal with customers. Customer satisfaction with a minimal impact on the environment is our main goal

name: Apsara Treks
description: We organize treks, tours and other tourism-related activities in Nepal, Tibet, Bhutan, and India. We also reserve accommodations in local houses or book lodges, hotels etc. We have been working in this industry for more than 15 years and satisfaction level of our clientele is very high. We create tailored travel plans for newly married couples, families with children, group of friends and individual travellers.

name: Female Tour Guide Nepal  - Private Tour
description: We are an all-female outfit specializing in guided Himalayan journeys in Nepal. We cater to solo female travellers, all female groups and aged but active adventurers, Run by a group of female guides who come from different parts of Nepal, we are here to make your journey in Nepal safe, smooth and memorable.

name: Adventure Ascent
description: Begin your Adventure, we will take care of the rest.

name: Sherpa Altitude Adventure Treks and Expedition
description: Sherpa Altitude Adventure is one of the reputed climbing adventure company based in Nepal. It offers trekking and climbing activities in Nepal Himalaya.

name: Aishwarya Travels Pvt. Ltd.
description: Aishwarya Travel is IATA certified traveling agent in Nepal run by professional with a decade of experience in air ticketing. With years’ experience, we can promise our customers a dedicated service to deliver the finest flight experience for our clients. We have been tied up with different national and international airlines to provide best possible solution with hassle free process. We make every tour adventurous, fun, stress free, exciting, and off course affordable. We see every individual person and group have their very own particular travelling desire and spending plan. We are Dependable, passionate, and experienced in providing a ticketing and tour packages for our clients.

name: Trek Holiday Nepal
description: "Trek Holiday Nepal" is established in 2009. It comprises a team of dedicated professionals who have many years of experience in the tourism sector and they can effectively arrange a tour, trekking, expedition and peak climbing according to your specific.

name: Raya Tours and Travels - Private Day Tours
description: Raya Tours & Travels is a well known government licensed travel agency in Kathmandu, Nepal. Our primary goal is to present the guest with wonderful travelling opportunities & culturally enriching adventures with reliable,friendly and experienced staffs all within traveler’s budgetary means. Cultural & Social Tours, Trekking, Jungle Safari, tailor made packages is our specialty.

name: Travel Away Treks and Expedition
description: Travel Away Treks and Expedition provides services of Hiking, Climbing and Eco tours. We have our service excellency with one of the finest manpower and resources. We offer safety and higher quality tours.

name: Movie Garden
description: A British/Nepali collaboration. Movie Garden was conceived to create a truly unique experience of the greatest films of the last 50 years. Our location is hidden away at the jungle's edge with a panoramic backdrop of Fewa Lake. Half covered and half open-air seating keeps the show on the road no matter what the weather and flashes of thunder and lightning can make for some of the most memorable nights of the year! We make our own pizza to authentic Italian recipes and keep the bar fully stocked so you can get a refreshment and soak up the view before the film begins. After the show is over we often find ourselves lingering until late to swap stories with the always varied mix of travelers, volunteers, adventurers and locals. Come and say hi sometime!

name: Namaste Spa
description: Welcome to the Namaste Spa where your body, your mind and your soul are taken into consideration when our treatments are performed by our skilled therapists. Our dream is to help you find your comforts in your busy and stressful life.

name: Elite Himalayan Adventure
description: Just as the name suggests we provide elite services for an exhilarating experience for extreme sports in high altitude. Primarily we are focused on mountain expeditions and peak climbing. However, we also provide bespoke packages for adventures wanting to take part in trekking, jungle safari, river rafting and other forms of exciting adventures.

name: Native Trails
description: Native Trails Pvt. Ltd. is an adventure & travel company with a team of young, energetic and experienced staff and trekking guides, who are dedicated to providing remarkable adventurous journeys with a focus on the natural exquisiteness of the hills and streams across Everest, Annapurna and Langtang Regions.

name: Malla Treks
description: Let Malla Treks customize your trip to Nepal on an adventure fully tailored to your needs. Malla trekking specialists will gladly help you plan an itinerary to suit your desired interests. This will be founded on what you are seeking on your visit to Nepal, be it the allurement of exotic cultures and festivals, or trekking to breathtaking mountains such as Everest, the Annapurnas, or Manaslu. Malla Treks will help you fulfill any challenges you wish to satisfy based on your physical ability and time frame. It is said “the greatest journey begins with a single step”. Please contact us for detailed information on the variety of excursions we have to offer.

name: Silver Oaks Handicraft
description: We are a family owned Franco Nepali jewellry shop specialising in custom design jewellry. Our designs are original, modern and classical, we stock a vast array of precious and semi-precious gems from Nepal. Bring in your own design, select the gemstone of your choice ans we can make your custom piece in gold or silver. Alternatively, you can join one of our classes and make it yourself within a day or two, depending on your design. So why not drop in and meet us today.

name: Sabbatical Explore Nepal
description: We offer different exciting trekking, peak climbing, Spiritual & cultural sightseeing, city & village tours, internship or volunteering programs for your Sabbatical & career break We make your travel safe, fun, meaningful and unforgettable. We can also manage itineraries as per your plans and specifications. Reach us via call or message to know in detail about all the travel possibilities with us.

name: Nepal Footprint Holiday Treks - Day Tours
description: Mountain trekking, day hiking and adventure holiday tours organize in Nepal. We offer personalized tailor-made small group trekking tour, Kathmandu day hikes and free information through local experience guides team. Talk or visit to us for free advice from Thamel, Kathmandu.

name: Sound Healing Nepal
description: Anup Panthi is probably one of the oldest and most respected names when it comes to sound healing and Nāda yoga. Born in a family with a strong linage to spirituality in Nepal, Anup has been conducting sound healing courses primarily one to one in Nepal and group workshops around the world for the past 12 years. Anup has Taught sound healing to more than 5000 people of which more than 1000 have received his one to one teaching and have gone to start their career and also started their own sound healing schools. Sound Healing Nepal offers Sound healing and therapy course in Nepal steeped in traditional methods but here you will also gain a complete understanding of frequencies, tones and different vibrational methodologies. These techniques are being used by modern therapists and contemporary healers around the world. The courses are arranged in one to one discipline. We don’t follow a fixed syllabus, the courses are specifically modified depending on your nature, needs and interests.

name: Swornim Tours & Travel Pvt . Ltd
description: Our company, Swornim Tours & Travel is a government registered travel company catering to all your travel needs. It is based in Kathmandu and operated by travel trade professionals with more than 25 years of experience. We organize package as well as tailor made Cultural Tours, Pilgrimage Tours, Jungle Safari, Trekking, Rafting, Hotel reservation,Mountain Flight.

name: Himalayan Cashmere Manufacturing Company
description: A leading manufacturer, exporter and wholesaler of exclusive cashmere products from Nepal since 2006. We have been manufacturing and exporting exclusive cashmere pashmina to USA, Europe and many Asia countries to large brand company to small retail outlets. We have worked with individual artist, designer and small business stores. Our skilled and experienced staffs are dedicated to quality, durability and esthetic essence. In addition to our own line of products, we also specialize in custom designs. We custom make product that match your color, texture, and look and feel like no other company. Our Products Luxurious cashmere fiber handcrafted in to art to wear as Scarves, Shawls, Throws, Blankets...woven in various designs and patterns; colored into wide range of hues and elegantly printed with our exclusive patterns, designs and arts. Knit wears, our knitting units set up to create an exclusive Cashmere Sweaters, Jumpers, Ponchos.

name: Golden Nepal Holidays Pvt.Ltd
description: Golden Nepal Holidays came t enforcement from 2019. We have started the company with two business partners and we have grown the number of people working to 8– 9 people in the organization.We do have skilled driver, expert Trek guide,Tour guide and a we do have Travel experts who customize the tour package for our client as per their requirements. We are still growing as a company and individuals.

name: Tourist Link Treks and Expedition
description: Trekking, Expeditions, peak climbing, Raftimg, jungle safari, sightseeing, Mountain flights, Tibet tours , Bhutan tours and Nepal tours

name: Trek and Adventure Nepal
description: Trek & Adventure Nepal P. Ltd is a legally registered trekking and tour company in Nepal with an established incentive grant heartening and memorable trips to every adventure enthusiast.

name: Well Nepal Travel & Tours
description: Well Nepal Travel is a government-registered tour & trekking and travel Agency in Nepal offering a wide variety of travel & adventure services including Nepal Trekking & Hiking, Cultural Tours, peak climbing, and all kind of adventure and cultural tours in Nepal.

name: Bespoken Himalayan Treks
description: We are a Kathmandu based Trekking company with the determination to provide clients with an experience of Nepal which, for all the right reasons, will be unforgettable. Attention to detail and a very personalized service are key objectives and the testimonies of our clients bear this out. We specialize in Trekking, Climbing Expeditions and Cultural Tours, in all areas of Nepal, ranging from short daily treks to Everest ascents. As our name suggests we aim to arrange custom-made itineraries for groups who are not just looking for a standard trek or climb but desire to grab as much from their time here as possible and tailor their visit to their individual interests. For example a day or more of river rafting or mountain biking may be added, or tours to specific sites, more time meeting local ethnics, in fact we will try to accommodate most requests. Our team is very experienced and is predominantly Sherpa mountain people who live and will benefit from the company.

name: Glance Tours and Treks
description: Welcome to GTT, your ultimate travel partner in Nepal! Discover Nepal's beauty and culture through our customized travel packages. From Kathmandu to sacred sites, we cater to all travelers seeking relaxation, adventure, or a spiritual journey. Experience Nepal's heart on our Heritage Site Tour, exploring UNESCO sites, admiring the Himalayas, and immersing in wildlife and culture.

name: Holy Mountain Treks
description: One of the outdoor activities and adventure treks organizer agency based in Nepal; Holy Mountain Treks extends all-inclusive services to a group or individual holidaymakers possessing a zeal for trekking, peak climbing, tours and other adventurous Himalayan activities.

name: Syangoche Panorama View Point
description: This is a view point which is situated at 3,890 meters altitude and has the close panoramic view of the Himalayas in Syangboche which is located just an hour of hike from Namche Bazaar. When reaching this view point, you can closely see Amadablam, Lhotse, Mt. Everest and many more Himalayas of Khumbu region. During your rest day in Namche, you can come here for acclimatization and view the panoramic scenes of the Himalayas.

name: Climbing Expedition
description: 'Let Climbing Himalaya take you to the summit of your dreams!' Climbing Himalaya is purely dedicated to servicing our customers and this company was opened with the purpose of serving our customers professionally and to the best of our ability. Glorified 25 years of our practice, the evolution all through the years have been a great experience. Our experiences, mistakes and empirical knowledge hav

name: Hike Nepal
description: Hello! I am Binod Mahat, the founder of Hike Nepal, Nepal’s premiere trekking and tour company. I’ve been leading treks and tours through Nepal’s mountains since 1999. After seven years of leading treks as an independent guide, I decided to start my own company in 2006. As someone with a passion for the outdoors and Nepal’s culture and history.

name: Adventure Discovery Treks & Expedition
description: Adventure Discovery Travel & Treks Company is running by highly trekking and tour professional in Nepal. Our main aim to offer you satisfactory services with reasonable price, Travelling in third world country like Nepal require that you should know the real and proper operators so that it insure your safety and satisfactory to give you maximum benefits. We specialize for Nepal Tours and Everest Base Camp Helicopter Flight Landing tour too.

name: Himalayan Asia Treks
description: Namaste , Himalayan Asia Treks is local Trekking Agency in Nepal. We are specialized deluxe trekking in Nepal, budget trek in Nepal, Nepal Tour. Trekking in Nepal is one of the unique experiences in the world. Nepal Trekking provides you the best opportunity to explore the beauty of Nepal with quality of Service & Best Price.

name: About Nepal Treks
description: Himalayan Recreation Treks and Expedition Pvt. Ltd is a leading private day tours company from Nepal, conducted by group of energetic young guys. Its all member have nearly 5 to 7 years experiences in tour and trekking fields in Nepal. Bishnu Thapa is the CEO of Himalayan Recreation Treks and Expedition Pvt. Ltd who is always ready to provide good services to the guests.

name: Ski Guides Nepal
description: We organize ski related activities in Himalayas region of Nepal in some of the world's highest ski platforms. Beside this we organize all forms of adventure tourism activities of Nepal including peak climbing , ice climbing , dirt bike tour, trekking etc. and also eco-trek and spirtual tourism in Himalayas.

name: Bella's Magic Mountains
description: My Wellness Treks in Nepal are affordable and would appeal to young people wanting to gain mental clarity and physical health. It’s about understanding and breaking bad habits, getting peace of mind, personal growth and actively being healthy and losing weight. My product is created around my experience and everything I felt I needed to know to attain health and happiness. I feel my product is perfectly designed for young people seeking to: · Understand themselves better · Get clear on how they want their life to progress · Form deep connection with others

name: Skywalk Paragliding
description: Founded in 2015, Skywalk has been offering tandem flights for anyone who would like to experience paragliding in Nepal. The unparalleled knowledge of paragliding conditions, locations and local cultures is what helps us provide our Sky Walkers with a beautiful and enthralling experience of paragliding in Nepal, here at Pokhara. We offer tandem flights throughout the year from Toripani and around.

name: The Classic Outdoors
description: Classic Outdoors is a registered travel and trekking company based in Kathmandu, Nepal. We mainly arrange guided cultural and adventure trips in the Himalayas. We offer a whole variety of packages including trekking, expeditions, city tours, outdoor adventure and more all across Nepal. Additionally, we take you beyond Nepal and other places in Tibet and Bhutan.

name: Vespa Valley
description: The Vespa Advantage; Apart from being uber cool, there's no better way to really experience where you are. You're not wrestling for a view from the back of a car or bus - you're right there in the hustle and bustle, sun on your back, wind in your hair.

name: Nepal Trek Adventure and Expedition
description: Greetings travelers, and a hearty welcome to the Nepal Trek Adventures & Expedition! We are a registered company in Kathmandu that is recognized by the Trekking Agencies Association of Nepal. We are best known for organizing treks, tours, and adventure activities in Nepal. Founded in 2006, we have been operating the best yet static and tailor-made itineraries of packages at a reasonable price since then. Moving forward with the motto "Customer's Satisfaction is Our Asset,", we provide 150 plus trekking and tour packages in conjunction with a set of well-experienced, professional, motivated, dedicated, and multilingual team members. These packages include everything from trekking, hiking, and flying over the high Himalayas to sightseeing excursions around the low valleys. With a wide range of facilities in Nepal, we similarly offer tours in foreign countries like India, Bhutan, and Tibet.

name: Mountain Treks Nepal
description: Mountain Treks Nepal is dedicated to offering travel services of the highest quality; combining our energy and eager, with decades of experience. Our greatest achievement comes in serving large numbers of satisfied clients who have experienced the joys and inspiration of travel. Ever since the company was established; Mountain Treks Nepal has condensed its attempt in producing quality travel, responding to the needs of the times while predicting the demands of the future.

name: Himalayan Steps
description: Himalayan Steps organises some of the very best day tours and trekking tours across the Himalayas. We are conveniently located in Thamel area which is at the heart of Kathmandu city, with an expert local team who work directly with our tour guides, porters and ground operations which enables us to provide the best possible customer service.

name: Reconnection Treks
description: WE love NEPAL, and we love to TREK. If you like the idea of trekking in the Himalayas, learning about culture, immersing yourself into Nepali life with a local then trek with us. We look after you like family. We support locals and grassroots projects that are making a difference in peoples lives through education and empowerment and we know Nepal. We know how to make your trip stress free.

name: Ecovoyage Travel and Tours
description: We provide facility that every traveler desires at Nepal. We fulfill their desires and make them feel comfortable and happy throughout the visit. We generally do jungle safari, rafting, mountain flight, sight seeing, paragliding, and many more as per the desire and want of customer at reasonable price.

name: Visit Himalaya Treks
description: Visit Himalaya Treks Pvt. Ltd. is travel and trekking agency-company in Nepal. We have specialized in Trekking, Adventure Holidays, Peak Climbing & Expedition in Nepal with years of experience.Kathmandu city has a very rich culture and history and has several interesting places to visit.

name: First Environmental Trekking
description: First Environmental Trekking humbly welcomes all the nature lovers to this small but magical country, Nepal. We are the proud owner of this 27 years old company. Our company is run by like-minded professional trekkers and mountaineers from Nepal who are passionate about trekking, environment, and our country. We make our living by helping people explore the mountains, forests, rivers, landscapes, culture, and the people of this country through various services and activities such as trekking, hiking, tours, biking, photography, rafting, paragliding, mountaineering, meditation, yoga, pilgrimage, volunteering. Please do not hesitate to contact us for more information!

name: Spiritual Excursion Private Limited
description: Spiritual Excursion organizes exciting day tours and sightseeing packages. These include mountain flights, bungee jumping, Paragliding, jungle safaris, helicopter tours, and much more. All our day tours are led by professional guides. So grab this golden opportunity with excellent arrangements and discover the activities you dream of.

name: Ambassador Himalaya
description: Welcome to Ambassador Himalaya Treks and Expedition Pvt. ltd, a Kathmandu-based adventure travel company in Nepal. Our company, led by young people locally, has years of experience in the adventure travel and tour sector. We organize the welfare of our visitors, the local community, and our staff because we are dedicated to eco-friendly and responsible tourism.

name: Get your guide world wide
description: Get your guide world wide started off with young and energetic people coming together with years of experience in the tour and travel sector in Nepal’s level where strategic thinking and proactive planning are geared towards meeting your corporate and program objectives. We organise all type of trekking and tour activities all over Nepal.

name: Nepalaya Spa
description: Nepalaya Spa is one of the best & biggest Day spa in Nepal.This spa is operated & managed by a family members who are well trained, qualified, well experienced massage therapist & Yoga instructor.We are recognized by Thamel Tourism Development Council.We are also pride ourselves in providing a holistic experience to our guests.we are centrally located in Thamel,Kathmandu,Nepal.

name: Everest One
description: Everest One has become known as one of the most exciting and credible Australian trekking and climbing companies. Already known around the world for the premium adventures we offer in Nepal, Africa, and South America. We are excited to host high altitude treks and mountain climbs for individuals, groups, and charities. 'It's your adventure, we just make it happen'

name: Tour Guide In Nepal - Sauraha
description: Leading tour operator and guidance service for all type of inbound tour in all over Nepal. Welcome to all to visit Naturally beautiful country Nepal.

name: Nepal Yetiraj Treks
description: Nepal Yetiraj Treks est une agence réceptive népalaise, francophone et anglophone, établie à Katmandu et agréée par le Gouvernement Népalais. Notre spécialité ? Les séjours et voyages sur mesure au Népal et en Inde himalayenne Notre clientèle ? Familles, individuels, groupes de 2 à 12 personnes Notre objectif ? Votre satisfaction et la découverte du Népal et/ou de l’Inde himalayenne avec une équipe 100% locale Notre atout ? Un prix intéressant avec un service de qualité et une rémunération équitable des prestataires locaux Que vous prévoyez de voyager seul, en famille ou entre amis, avec ou sans enfants… Que vous préférez un séjour sous tente (bivouac), en auberge guesthouse ou chez l’habitant… Plutôt facile « les mains dans les poches » ou plutôt sportif… De préférence culturel… A la rencontre des populations locales… Envie d’un voyage authentique là où le Népal ou Inde himalayenne est encore préservé du tourisme à grande échelle…

name: Himalayan Sunrise Trekking and Expeditions
description: Himalayan Sunrise is run by Bishnu Rai and his team, People have always been facinated about sharing the environmental and cultural beauty of the country Nepal with people wanting to experience a special and unique holiday package. Bishnu has been a trekking and mountaineering guide for nearly two decades and his experience, combined with his deep love for his country and its people.

name: Shree Ganapati Jewellers
description: Shree Ganapati Jewellers (SGJ) is a jewelry shop that specializes in traditional Nepali jewelry, especially those made with 24 Karat Gold. These jewelry pieces are renowned for being prodigious in size but light in weight. Shopping in SGJ is an excellent way to indulge in Nepali, Newari and Limbu culture through gold, silver and diamonds.

name: Yarsa
description: We offer once in a lifetime trekking experience that connects meditation, philosophy, and adventure. Our name Yarsa comes from Yarsagumba, which is a summer-grass winter-animal Himalayan herb found in Dolpa (a rocky Himalayan region in Nepal). As such, our treks are a blend of both the animallike adventurous spirit and plantlike calmness.

name: Explore Vacation Pvt. Ltd.
description: Explore Vacation is a collaborative initiation of a group of highly experienced travel/trek experts. With an experience of over a decade in the field, we provide you a highly proficient and specialized holiday packages in various exotic destinations. Our main objective is to provide our clients with a unique and exciting experiences ranging from cultural tours, family holidays to offbeat & adventurous spree.

name: Malla Sisters Women Adventure Guides
description: Malla sisters adventure guides from pokhara Nepal offer unique experiences, the Annapurna circuit,Manaslu and Tsum valley Trek,ABC, Upper Mustang, Jomsom Muktinath, Millennium Trek, Panchase Trek, Ghorepani Poonhill Trek, Mardi Himal Trek, Nagi Mohore Danda Trek, Khopra Trek etc.

name: Treklust Adventures
description: TrekLust Adventures is among the best trekking companies in Nepal lead by a team of experts with years of experience. Our proficient and licensed trek team has been leading myriad successful adventure trips all across the mesmerizing himalayas.

name: Friendship Trekking
description: About us..!!! Dear Guests & Friends ! Namaste,Sewa and Heartily Warm Greetings from Kathmandu,Nepal. The Friendship is one of the most important aspects of our life. Thus, considering the suggestion and choice of our foreigner friends in this long experience of trekking since 2008 AD, we are glad to share our experience with you now as "Friendship Trekking Pvt.Ltd."

name: Refresh Spa
description: Welcome to our spa for getting relaxing massage and beauty works for better health. Relief from stress and muscles tension. See yourself in a new light.

name: Sports Tours and Travel
description: Everest Helicopter tour Everest Helicopter is one of the most amazing experience one could do on earth.Himalayan Kingdom Nepal houses eight above 8000m mountains among fourteen in the world. It’s a dream for all travelers who visit Nepal, to watch them from a close distance.This tours rules all .

name: BP Scout Peak Treks and Expedition
description: BP Scout Peak Treks and Expedition Pvt Ltd offers and organizes tailor-made trekking and expedition to Everest Base Camp (EBC), Annapurna Circuit, Lantang, Manaslu, Makalu and many exciting destinations in the Great Himalayas around Nepal. Our aim is also to introduce Baden Powell Scout Peak, the mushroom shape mountain of Nepal Scouts situated in Langtang. Happy Holidays!! Welcome to Nepal.

name: Development Tourism
description: At Development Tourism we have taken the hassle out of your next backpack destination. Development Tourism is a leading Nepalese-owned company, we have a tendency to offer wholesale tour operators with the dual advantages of affordable ground services and superior quality itineraries and travel designing services.

name: Nepal Treks Tours
description: Nepal Treks Tours (p.) Ltd. a leading travel agency in Nepal. A Destination Management Company in Nepal, We are one of key travel agents in Nepal that brings tours of "Incredible Nepal", the country that has mystified the world for centuries.

name: Go Trek Nepal Day Tour
description: Go Trek Nepal Day tours organize champa devi hiking tours in western part of Kathmandu valley. Basically,it takes about an hour drive then hike up from the pharping to up hill toward Hattiban. The trail is gradual after walking half hour walk the view point will be appeared from where you can see all the mountain range of Langtang range and the beautiful valley of Kathmandu, Patan and Bhaktapur.

name: Monterosa Treks and Expedition- kailash Tour package
description: We have a great pleasure to introduce our Trekking Expedition Company. We, Monterosa Treks & Expedition are run by professional Trekking & Expedition Team, tour guides in English, Hindi, Japanese, French, Italian, Spanish, German, since the year of establishment i.e. 1993. Monterosa treks and expedition P. Ltd is the trekking and tour Company registered under Government of Nepal. Being involved in this field for so long, we have acquired great experience in trekking. We have been leading pilgrimage treks to Mt. Kailash and holy Lake Manasarovar for over two decades helping pilgrims all over the world to enjoy this holy journey with an adventure. Also, we are always ready to assist you to organize Nepal peak climbing expedition to scale the mountains of Nepal & Tibet. So you can join with our programs.

name: Lhasso Adventure
description: Lhasso Adventure is one of the leading adventure travel DMC companies in Nepal. The company is running by experienced adventure leaders, specialised in trekking, mountaineering, tours and other fulfilled adventurous activities in Nepal, Tibet and Bhutan. The Company is affiliated with Government of Nepal – Ministry of Culture, Tourism and Civil aviation, Nepal Tourism Board, Trekking Agencies Association of Nepal (TAAN), Nepal Mountaineering Association (NMA), Kathmandu Environmental Education Project (KEEP), Himalayan Rescue Association Nepal (HRA) and Village Tourism Promotion Forum Nepal (VITOF-NEPAL).

name: Into Nepal
description: Namaste, my friends, my name is Arjun Adhikari and I’m Nepalese guide and founder of Into Nepal. I offer day tours. Since I was kid playing on the slopes of Himalayas, I had a dream of becoming tour guide one day so I can show people what I could see – how beautiful Nepal is. Training survivors ultimately provides the Sister’s with opportunities to build marketable skills, self-esteem and economic independence to help keep them out of the cycle of violence and become leaders in any field they choose. As of 2018, SASANE has provided job opportunities to 371 female survivors of human trafficking.

name: The Tibetan Encounter Day Tours
description: Embark on a unique journey of discovery and cultural immersion with the Tibetan Encounter tours, led by a Tibetan guide with a personal connection to the land and its people. As a member of the Tibetan community with a family history of escape from Tibet in 1959, I am deeply passionate about educating others about the Tibetan settlements in Pokhara, Nepal. My tours offer a rare opportunity to explore the rich cultural heritage of the Tibetan people and gain a deeper understanding of the challenges faced by Tibetan refugees. As the only Tibetan guide offering these tours, I am dedicated to providing a personalized and educational experience for all of my clients. Join me in learning about the fascinating history and traditions of the Tibetan settlements in Pokhara, and discover why I am so passionate about sharing this unique aspect of Tibetan culture with the world.

name: Sagarmatha Next
description: Sagarmatha Next is a experience centre that promotes sustainable tourism in the Khumbu region by changing the perception around waste and minimizing the environmental footprint of each visitor. Through the various interactive exhibitions and film screenings, we want to get visitors aware of their environmental impact and offer them to be part of the solution. Every visitor is encouraged to participate in 'carry me back' - a crowdsourced waste removal where everyone can remove 1 kg of waste from Sagarmatha National Park. We also invite artists and product designers to innovate with waste, and visitors can learn about the process of transforming and upcycling, and are encouraged to participate in the workshops to create art and products themselves. Strategically located en route to Everest Base Camp, Sagarmatha Next is a must-visit in your Himalayan Expedition!

name: Pokhara Nepal Dance Lessons

Dance is very important in Nepali culture and I had lessons from age 8-15. Then I began to help teach the other younger children in my home. Now I want to share my passion for dance with people visiting Nepal, to show them my culture and teach them how to dance like real locals!

name: Nepal's Handmade Singing Bowl Centre
description: The Nepal’s Handmade Singing Bowl Centre is a well-known establishment located in Pottery Square Bhaktapur , Nepal. They are known for creating high-quality, traditional singing bowls using the same techniques that have been used for centuries. Singing bowls have been used for meditation, music therapy, and spiritual healing for thousands of years. The process of creating these bowls involves hammering and shaping metal to create a precise shape and sound. The artisans at the Handmade Singing Bowl Centre take great pride in their work and use only the highest quality materials, including Gold, Silver, Tin, Lead, Iron, Copper, and Bronze metals. Visitors to the Handmade Singing Bowl Centre can learn more about the history and tradition of singing bowls, as well as watch the artisans at work crafting each individual bowl by hand. They also offer a wide range of bowls for sale, from small handheld bowls to larger, ceremonial bowls.

name: Elephant Care Nepal
description: Experience Ethical Elephant Tourism in Nepal with Elephant Care Nepal Namaste! I am Dikshya Rijal, founder of Elephant Care Nepal, on a mission to provide a happy life to all Elephants in Nepal that they truly deserve and creating a safe haven for them. Say goodbye to elephant rides and embrace a journey where you connect with these majestic creatures in a more meaningful way. Why choose us: -Ethical alternatives to elephant safaris -Meaningful connections with elephants in their natural environment -Support local communities and contribute to animal welfare -Create lasting memories while making a positive impact. Your participation isn't just an experience; it's a commitment to their care. Be a champion for animal welfare and play a part in giving these gentle giants the happiness they deserve. Make a difference with your travel choices – choose ethical tourism in Nepal and be a part of something truly meaningful. Book your experience with Elephant Care Nepal on TripAdvisor now!

name: Funny Nepal Treks & Expedition - Private Day Tours
description: The Managing Director and Funny Nepal Treks & Expeditions (P) Ltd.The name of the company might sound quite peculiar to our clients; however, let us delve into how the company received its name. Customers and clients who became up close with Mr. Dhamala started casually calling him "Fani"; and this became his "nickname" and since then the name has stuck - so, inorder to identify with the company he runs, the agency became "Funny Nepal Treks & Expeditions". Mr. Dhamala had humble beginnings as a porter which gradually saw him turn into a seasoned mountain guide and also Managing Director at the said agency; this he has been doing for the last 10 years. The porters, guides and staff working at Funny Nepal are government licensed individuals who have undergone intensive training and are always updated on modern equipment and saftey measures. They are friendly and affable with their clients and are very enthusiastic about their profession.Funny Nepal Treks & Expeditions has had 18 years of expertise and experience in the field of tourism and is run by a team of seasoned experts who have handled clients coming from every nook and corner of the world. These clients bear testimony to our services. Reliability and professionalism coupled with our care have made our treks, expeditions and adventures a memorable one for our clients. We provide services in multiple areas of tourism and ensure that it is tailor-made for your personal requirements. Your satisfaction is our utmost priority as our reputation is something we value more than anything else. We are also open to advice and suggestions of our clients and customers.We make arrangements for services and equipments in trekking, expeditions, hiking, city sightseeing, helicopter tours, jungle safari, river rafting and kayaking, paragliding, honey hunting, cultural tours, bungee jumping, mountain biking and many more, and all these suited to your personal needs and requirements.Our services extend beyond Nepal to Bhutan , Sikkim , Tibet and Darjeeling . We also make arrangements for your stay at some of the best budget and high end hotels and lodges.Our company is affiliated to Nepal Tourism Board (NTB), Trekking Agents Association of Nepal (TAAN), Kathmandu Environmental Education Project (KEEP) and Nepal Mountaineering Association (NMA). Our staff are well-versed in languages like English, Hindi, French, Italian, Spanish and various many other languages.If you want your adventure holiday to be an exciting and memorable one, just call us contact us at the given numbers and addresses, and we will gladly be of service to you.

name: Motherland Hiking Team - Private Day Tours
description: Nepal is world famous popular destination for adventure-sports. Bungee Jumping is one of the extreme adventure sports designed to experiences heart-quickening adventure from high above in the George by tightening a nylon rope. This sporty experience in Nepal is over the gorge of Bhote Koshi River at the height of 160 meters. Jumping over the wild gorge of Bhote Koshi is thrilling and the pleasant experience. For reaching over the Bhote Koshi River you have to travel 100km. on roadways along Araniko Highway. Bungee Jumping Bridge is near the border of Tibet (12km. before Lhasa) which can be accessed within 3-4 hours drive. The magnificent natural sights while travelling attractive, thus give very pleasant experience of the trip before taking part in Jump over the river. The station of Bungee Jumping has one resort named as The Last Resort where you can enjoy dishes of different taste. After jumping, you can continue trekking or return back to Kathmandu.

description: At Vista Trek (Pvt.) Ltd, our main aim is to give all who travel with us a memorable and rewarding experience, and to share our knowledge of Nepal’s natural and cultural heritage. As such, we will provide you a chance not only to see the Himalaya, but also to experience Nepali culture, history and religion up close. We are sure the great gulps of the clean, fresh Himalayan air will invigorate you, and we look forward to sharing our beautiful country with you.We offer a variety of services to make your trip to Nepal and beyond exciting and memorable. We specialize in adventure activities in the Nepal Himalaya, as well as Tibet, Bhutan, and India, and have an array of highly experienced guides (fluent in English, Japanese, Spanish, Hindi & French) who have been leading people through the Himalaya for over a decade. So, whether you are interested in trekking, climbing, expeditions, bungy jumping, river rafting, jungle safaris, or prefer sightseeing and cultural/historical tours, we can help you plan the perfect holiday. In order to make your stay hassle free, we are also able to assist with accommodation and transportation reservations. If you choose trekking or climbing, we can provide you with support (professional guides, sherpas, cooks, porters) and any necessary clothing, climbing gear, or equipment. We can also assure you that your guide and other support members (if any) will be equipped for the various climates you will experience, ensuring everyone’s safety and enjoyment.We feel our guests are like members of our family, and this is reflected in our hard work, diligence and attentiveness to our clients. It is our great pleasure to provide you with whatever you need to make your holiday an enjoyable one, and our professional team is capable of bringing your dream to reality whether you are a professional climber or beginner seeking new challenges.Reasons to Travel with Vista Trek:* Safety* Reliability* Variety of Services.* Experienced and Honest Staff* Equipment

name: The SU4E Home
description: Since 2014, Stand Up 4 Elephants has been bringing a progressive and ethically responsible approach regarding improving the conditions of the captive elephants in Nepal. End of 2018, we started the construction of the SU4E HOME, a place built as a model of what is possible with minimal investment to manage elephants in a kinder way. Thanks to our long-term partners Le Pal Nature Foundation, Brabant Walloon, and the Brigitte Bardot Foundation, we were able to welcome our first rescue Eva at the end of 2019 and Lhamo at the end of 2020. The SU4E HOME welcomes the caretakers of each rescued elephant, they are the key to the success. Happy mahouts = Happy elephants! The SU4E HOME is made up of a shelter for elephants open to an enclosure of about 1 hectare including a large elephant swimming pool. On the human side, the mahouts each have an individual room, a large common kitchen, and showers. The team welcomes visitors every day at 2pm.

A truly international class restaurant is in operation at the Bottom Station premises serving local, Indian and international cuisines. A souvenir shop, coin operated games are also operational and many other developments are planned for the future. A resort of International standards is also planned at the bottom station complex at Kurintar. Imported from Austria, the cable car system is 100% safe with back up generator, hydraulic emergency drive, and staff qualified & trained in emergency rescue with modern rescue devices provided by the manufacturer of the cable car system.

A valley sorrounded by green forests and meadows. A city of ever smiling faces of indigenous people and clean environment. A city of Natural beauty and known as Switzerland of Nepal. Without a visit of Pokhara the visit of Nepal is incomplete. Certainly, any one who had been to pokhara once he's compelled to say so or to feel so. Welcom to Pokhara. Don't be anxious about your time. Pokhara Ultralight provides golden opportunity of having a heavenly taste of vergin beauty of Nature within an exceptionally short span of time with it's micro plane services. Call at or Visit the office of Pokhara Ultralight Pvt.Ltd. When flying over the valley, near the Annapurna range, around the Fishtail peak one can have a heart-touching "Bird's eye view" of the most beautiful scenery of green forests and meadows, heavenly scene of lakes and rivers as well as the traditional Nepali villages far below on the valley and at the same time can enjoy a closer views of ever glowing and shining mountains just when swimming through the blue sky!!! It's not a mere imagination. If anyone wish, he can have all this, indeed. Dream comes true. One can fly-high like an eagle. He can soar-high in the air. He can embrace the clouds and can have a closer glimpse of white Peaks. Yes, one can feel and collect such divinely experiences with the most pleasant and comfortable flights of "Pokhara Ultra-light"

name: Gorkha Zone Khukuri House
description: Namaste, and welcome to Gorkha Zone khukuri House. We are the local business engaged in Handicraft Industry, producing and supplying the local product to the local and international market through the medium of our store in Thamel, Kathmandu, Nepal and online store. Through our products we are preserving and globalizing our culture. Since 2003-04,Gorkha Zone Khukuri House has been producing a premium handcrafted Gurkha khukuri(kukri) knives which is famous for its distinct inwardly curved shape knife and the soldier behind this weapon, Gurkha. We are the official suppliers to the Gurkha forces in England, India, Afghanistan, Iraq, Brunei, Singapore; Nepal Army, Nepal Police and foreign diplomats, US army & marines. We were occasionally supplying khukuries to the Chinese Delegates, Pakistan, USA and European Embassies, Travel companies, Manpower Companies, Security Companies and National Banks as well. Gorkha Zone Khukuri House is registered under company registration act of Government of Nepal. We are also registered in Department of Commerce and member of federation of Handicraft Association of Nepal. We deal with our local resources like men, material, money to produce our product. In relation to the men we have employed the Kami's (black smith), who are the born khukuri knife maker to produce a Gurkha khukuri Knives. Mostly Carbon-steel Rc-5160, Nepali Glue (laha), Rose wood, Buffalo Hide, yak Hide, Buffalo Horn, Yak Horn, Pine wood, Brass pins, coal are the material used. We use a local bank for transactions. Since our store is central hub for collection of various Knives and khukuris; We provide employment to local people who make Knives and khukuris, and marketise their products to global market. So these platforms for globalization of local market products has become greater importance to our society and market. Each and every sell of our product has not only generated income but also created employment opportunities in the society. We are a manufacturer and exporter of premium Handcrafted Gurkha Khukuri (Kukri) knives from Nepal . The Kami, who has been making Gurkha khukuri Knives to Gurkhas, King and Soldier of Nepal since 16th century are the ones making khukuri knives for us, so that we can preserve, globalize our culture by showing our bravery, honesty and determination for our family and country. our customers for nearly a decade. We believe in quality product and service with 100% customer satisfaction. As all of our Khukuries are made by hand using a high grade carbon steel as raw materials, they are very strong and with 100% performance. Since due to popularity of our products we have been manufacturing swords, knives and daggers as well and we also take order from the customer and fulfill their product as per their customization. So, we are very happy to serve customer all around the world and we welcome you to our store and please help our community to make stronger.

name: Museum of Nepali Art
description: “The mission of the Museum of Nepali Art is to collect, preserve, document, research, and exhibit Nepali art and artistic practices. It aims to educate visitors on Nepali art leading to an understanding, appreciation and the promotion of our artistic heritage.” The Museum of Nepali Art (MoNA) occupies a unique position in the art world because of its focus on Nepali artistic practices and traditions. Nepali art is a reflection of the country’s culture and soul, with an artistic history spanning over two millennia. The museum houses a collection of Nepali art that covers both its religious traditions and more recent secular manifestations. Through regular exhibition, it explores the historic and cultural influences on Nepali art practices to encourage a better understanding, appreciation and promotion of Nepali art and artists. Situated in the Kathmandu Guest House, Museum of Nepali Art (MoNA) aims to make the art works of past and present Nepali master artists easily accessible

There are numerous other treks available in the Everest, Annapurna and Langtang regions. We offer organized treks to Gokyo valley, the Lake and the top Gokyo Ri where one can enjoy spectacular views of Mt. Everest, Cho Oyu and other Himalayan mountains. On the way, you will get to experience pristine woodlands, deep gorges, high snow peaks, traditional yet diverse Nepali cultures, & welcoming people - after all, Gautam Buddha was born in Nepal. If you are looking for a life-changing experience, visit Nepal, and we will take you on a journey you will remember throughout your life.

name: Paintball Nepal
description: Our paintball field lies in the heart of Kathmandu, about 1 km from the tourist hub. We were the pioneers of paintball in Nepal when we started in 2011 and we are still considered the best, largest and safest operator in the country. We operate independently from the fun park, although we are located within. Truly a little quiet oasis, perfect to hang out with friends. We have large trees, pallets, bunkers on the field in a surrounding that resembles a bit of woods ball and speed ball. We are open every day of the week from 10:30 am to 7 pm. Reservations can be essential especially on Saturdays. If you want to play earlier or later please call a day ahead and we will be happy to accommodate any request. You are welcome to bring your own snacks and drinks. We hope to see you soon !! What do I need to wear? - You must bring your own footwear, suitable for bush conditions, which supports your ankles ant totally enclose your feet (boots, athletic shoes). Although gum boots are available on request. - Wear dark, baggy clothing that you do not mind getting dirty or tattered while running (and sometimes rolling) through the obstacles. ADMISSION & RENTALS °° SNIPER PACKAGE 300 NPR incl 30 balls, face mask, body armor, overall, marker ...FIELD PAINTBALLS 7 days a week. 24 hours on reservation. What's included? * Playing fee * Welcome and full briefing * Protective equipment and Paintball Gear * Paintball battle against an opponent * Manual or Semi Automatic Marker

name: Nepal Royal Tourism Holiday
description: Chandragiri hill is 22 kilometer from Thamel lies on the south-west of Kathmandu vale. Day Hiking is perhaps one of the most exciting new destinations to hiking day tour in Nepal. The hiking path is stuffed with exotic forest and offers exciting views of the Himalayas and ancient hamlets. The hiking expedition takes you to the tempting hill station of Chandragiri Hill to witness the impressive views of the Himalayas. Chandragiri is a completely exquisite site that lies in Kathmandu. Chandragiri is rather renowned as a viewpoint to look at the beautiful views of sunrise and sunset. Towering at an elevation of 2,275m from the sea level, it's one of the most admired travel sites of Kathmandu. Highlights of Chandragiri Hiking Trip Spectacular views of snow-capped mountains like Ganesh Himal, Mt. Manaslu, Langtang Ranges, Dorge Lakpa and many more. Many medicinal herbs in the forest. Varieties of Birds. Best day hiking spot. Beautiful sunrise viewpoint near Kathmandu .

name: Everest Base Camp Helicopter Tour
description: Everest Base Camp Helicopter Tour, where you are taken to see Mount Everest, gives you a quick look of the Everest region finally allowing you to land on Everest Base Camp or Kalapathar. This Helicopter tour of Everest is so far the best Ariel tour in the world. Everest Base Camp Helicopter Landing Tour starts from Kathmandu, flying towards the beautiful Sherpa village and the gateway to Everest, Lukla. After fueling in Lukla, the flight starts flying towards Everest Base Camp. The flight goes over the Tengboche, Dingboche, Gorakshep and Khumbu glacier to reach the Everest Base camp. This ultimate helicopter ride gives you some of the best mountain views and sceneries. You will be given a maximum of 10 minutes of landing time at Everest Base Camp due to the altitude threat. And on the way back, you will be given 30 minutes at Hotel Everest View to take Breakfast or tea/coffee with excellent views of Mt. Everest and its range. Further, you will fly back to Lukla and then to Kathmandu.

name: The Crematoria
description: Hindu’s greatest god Pashupatinath has group of gods and goddesses surrounding him which spreads in an area of about 3 square kilometers. The vibrant ambiance of the area never takes a break which is also the holiest Hindu pilgrimage site with smoky and stirring melee of temples, iconic ancient statues, the pilgrims and decorated half naked holy men called Shadus. On the footstep of temple is Bagmati River separating the Pashupatinath area into to 2. The riverbank also called Aryaghat by Hindu is considered the most sacred site for the dead bodies to be cremated. As per the legends this Ghat should never be left vacant without burning the bodies as Pashupatinath is naturally offered with the smoke from those dead bodies burning on Aryaghat. If in case there are no bodies to burn by any chance the representative form of the dead body must be made of dried Darbha Grass (Desmostachya bipinnata) which is considered holy grass in Hinduism called Kush and has to be continuously burnt there.

name: Nepal Myths and Mountain Trails - Day Tours
description:
Program:

AM: Fly Kathmandu to Pokhara.

Upon arrival, we drive to visit Davis Falls.

Davis falls : Locally Known as Patale Chhango in the southern flank of the Pokhara valley, where the stream flowing from Phewa Lake collaplses and surges down the rock into a deep gorge, leaping through several potholes.

Then we will be visiting Tibetan Refugee Camp.

Tibetan Refugee Camp : Tibetan Village Tashiling in the south and Tashii Palkhel in the north of Pokhara valley is the two Tibetan villages which is inhabitant by the Tibetan people who keeps themselves busy by producing and trading woolen carpets and other handicrafts. 

After wards, we drive to Lakeside to visit Phewa Lake and Barahi Temple.

Phewa Lake and Barahi Temple : Situated at an altitude of 800meters above sea level, it is the second largest lake in the Nation. With Barahi island Temple in the middle of the lake it is the most important religious monument in Pokhara. Built almost in the middle of Phewa Lake, this two-storied pagoda is dedicated to the boar manifestation of Ajima, the protector’s deity representing the female force Shakti. The reflection of Mt. Machhapuchhare & Annapurna can be seen in its serene water. Thick forest lies on the adjoining southern slopes of the lake. Spend few hours in Lakeside and go for one hour boating in Phewa Lake. You can do shopping in the market of Lakeside.

Then we drive to airport to catch your flight back to Kathmandu.

description: At Chaitanya Health & Wellness - Naturopathy Clinic Center, we will help you to take better care and refresh your body, mind, & soul. The Wellness Center is facilitated by traditional, contemporary, and natural forms of therapy under the constant and competent supervision of expert naturopathic physicians. Our trained and experienced therapists ensure that every visit to our wellness center is a unique experience for our customers. Our services include relaxation massage therapy, beauty & salon service, ayurvedic treatment and many more.

name: Three Jewels Adventures
description: Three Jewels Adventures established in 2001 is a Nepali guides-owned Adventure Travel Company. We specialize in trekking and climbing including in off the beaten trails. We also present the 'Private Kathmandu Walking Day Tours', where visitors can experience unfrequented places related to the history of the Kathmandu Valley and Nepal.

name: Backstreet Academy
description: Explore Nepali culture through our exclusive collection of travel experiences - carve a marble slab, cook momos or learn traditional dancing, the backstreets offer the richest interaction with the culture and people of a place. Immerse yourself in the de facto Nepali experience where the local backdrop retains its integrity and originality and discover a side of the city you never knew, available only through the forgotten backstreets. Backstreet Academy works with many competent yet struggling craftsmen with whom we structure a course together to teach the world about their traditional craft. Be it at their home or their workshops, we offer our guests access to a 'behind the scenes' experience that is often overlooked. This is the real local, the real Nepal, the real experience. And as you discover the backstreets, we will pair you with a facilitator who will help you translate and make sure you have a great time while making an impact. Courses available include: - Marble Carving - Animal Sculptures - Momo Cooking Class - Dal Bhat Cooking Class - Laptop Sleeve Making - Rice Sack Bags - Batik - Dry Flower Art - Traditional Dance Lessons Our other cities include: Phnom Penh | Siem Reap | Kathmandu | Luang Prabang | Vientiane

name: Tourist Vehicle Service
description: We offer the wide range of vehicle rental service to our clients for giving them the best of comforts. We offer Car, Van, Jeep, Hiace, Coaster, Sutlej, Pojero, Prado, Land cruiser, 4wd jeep and deluxe bus at a very affordable price. We always take care of our customer to give much better service during their stay in Nepal. Please also remember us for Kathmandu city tour, Kathmandu Private Tour, Day Tours, Nagarkot Tour, Namobuddha Tour, Kathmandu - Pokhara - Chitwan Tour, Pokhara City Tour, Lumbini Tour, Rara Lake Tour, Upper Mustang Tour, Kalinchowk Tour, Halesi Mahadev Tour, Daily Manakamana Tour, off road tour in Nepal, Rental Car in Nepal, Rental Bus in Nepal, Rental Vehicle in Nepal, Jeep Tour in Nepal, School Tours, Collage Tour, Group Tour in Nepal, VIP tour in Nepal, VIP vehicle rental in Nepal, Vehicle Rental in Kathmandu, Pokhara, Lumbini and Chitwan.

name: Trek in Nepal Peak Adventures
description: Trekkinnepal is one of the pioneer leading trekking service provider in Nepal and Tibet, based in Nepal with international networks with top class, qualified skilled, and with national and international experience. We do have more than 22 years of experience so we know to explore the best way to experience nature and culture up close, which will make your adventure the ultimate experience with hospitality at its best .We still believe in our old saying “Visitors are our Guests.” Nepal, a heavenly place, rich in Nature beyond the limit a Shangri-La . Blows pure fresh air from the dense rain forest and crystal clear pure water from the great Himalayas which is rich in itself in minerals. Comprises an area of 147,181 sq. km bordering China to the north and India to the east, west and south with the population of 26 millions (2011 census). It is the richest country in the world in terms of bio-diversity due to its unique geographical position and latitudinal variation with the home of M

name: Himalayan Wild Treks
description: HIMALAYAN WILD TREKS (HWT) is a group of dedicated, young and experienced trekking specialists.Himalayan Wild Treks is a well-trusted Nepalese trekking company that leads trips for single travelers or large groups.We take pleasure in welcoming you to the Himalayan country of Nepal for tours and treks to some of the most magnificent places on the planet, places of legendary scenery where heaven seems to meet the Earth. It truly is the experience of a lifetime. We specialize in trekking, hiking, peak climbing and cultural tours. We do custom tours and we also have a number of fixed tour packages.We listen carefully to your queries regarding a diverse range of tourism activities available in the Himalayas of Nepal.Your quest for a special itinerary with inclusive services requires the right organizer and a responsible agency. name: Beyond Base Camp Treks
description: Anyone can be a trekking guide but at Beyond Base Camp Treks we want to immerse you in a true and authentic experience by employing Sherpa guides. Sherpas are an ethnic group of people originating from Tibet and their bodies are genetically engineered for high altitudes. Our Sherpa guides grew up in the mountain regions of Nepal and average over 20 years of trekking and mountaineering experience.
